desc: Welcome to Ella June’s, your one-stop shop for local gifts, accessories and women’s apparel in Hancock County. Ella June’s was created from a mother/daughter duo’s vision to bring a little more style, fashion and fun gifts to their hometown of Greenfield, IN and was named after the co-owner’s three-year-old daughter.

layout.text: Hand picked fashion styled for beautiful women by women just like yourself! Shop our ladies clothing, jewelry, accessories and more.
